quote: Attention to health is life greatest hindrance.
A comfortable house is a great source of happiness. It ranks immediately after health and a good conscience.
A little rebellion now and then... is a medicine necessary for the sound health of government.
A man needs a purpose for real health.
Age does not depend upon years, but upon temperament and health. Some men are born old, and some never grow up.
Avoid lawsuits beyond all things; they pervert your conscience, impair your health, and dissipate your property.
Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
Attention to health is life greatest hindrance.
A comfortable house is a great source of happiness. It ranks immediately after health and a good conscience.
A little rebellion now and then... is a medicine necessary for the sound health of government.
A man needs a purpose for real health.
Age does not depend upon years, but upon temperament and health. Some men are born old, and some never grow up.
Avoid lawsuits beyond all things; they pervert your conscience, impair your health, and dissipate your property.
Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
Cynicism is humor in ill health.
Every violation of truth is not only a sort of suicide in the liar, but is a stab at the health of human society.
Give a man health and a course to steer; and he'll never stop to trouble about whether he's happy or not.
Happiness is good health and a bad memory.
Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
Happiness lies first of all in health.
He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything.
He whom the Gods love dies young, while he is in health, has his senses and his judgments sound.
Health is not simply the absence of sickness.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.
Health of body and mind is a great blessing, if we can bear it.
I am a vegetarian for health reasons - the health of the chicken.
I'm a big proponent of having a mental health component go along with whatever the physical realities are.
If you can be well without health, you may be happy without virtue.
Imagination is not a talent of some people but is the health of everyone.
It is well to be up before daybreak, for such habits contribute to health, wealth, and wisdom.
Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health.
Medicine to produce health must examine disease; and music, to create harmony must investigate discord.
Pain adds rest unto pleasure, and teaches the luxury of health.
Perfect freedom is as necessary to the health and vigor of commerce as it is to the health and vigor of citizenship.
So many people spend their health gaining wealth, and then have to spend their wealth to regain their health.
The first draught serveth for health, the second for pleasure, the third for shame, and the fourth for madness.
The first wealth is health.
The first wealth is health.
The health of a democratic society may be measured by the quality of functions performed by private citizens.
The true index of a man's character is the health of his wife.
To safeguard one's health at the cost of too strict a diet is a tiresome illness indeed.
Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your gold and good health have vanished.
Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished.
True friendship is like sound health, the value is seldom appreciated until it is lost.
True friendship is like sound health, the value of it is seldom known until it be lost.
Virtue is like health: the harmony of the whole man.
Virtue is, like health, the harmony of the whole man.
Water is life, and clean water means health.
What can be added to the happiness of a man who is in health, out of debt, and has a clear conscience?
What some call health, if purchased by perpetual anxiety about diet, isn't much better than tedious disease.
With age comes the understanding and appreciation of your most important asset, your health.
Young men wish; love, money and health. One day, they'll say; health, money and love.
Good digestion waits an appetite, and health an both.
